verbs.description: During [ARGM-LOC: that cabinet meeting] [R-ARGM-LOC: in which] [ARG0: he] [V: berated] [ARG1: DHS Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen] , Trump was furious because he did n’t think she was totally on board with his demand that children be separated from their parents if they ’re caught at the border . Now he ’s trying to blame his own policy on Democrats . Put pressure on the Democrats …
